one_reviews_text: Sounds like a pretty gushing review there for a very low poly, fixed position, 10 minutes and you have done everything. Good value for money however, as is a large Mocha. It's a nice example of what you can do learning VR in Unity so well done for that. After so many deepy immersive high budget games that cost 10 times this, I am still left feeling this is short of 1/10th the value for money.
review_feedback: Thank you for your valuable feedback. We launched earlier on Sidequest with 2 experience then from feedback we improved many things and still we are working on. Your lower star rating definitely demotivate small india development studio and higher ratings can motivate us to make better experience. Thank you again

one_reviews_text: loved all experiences for an affordable cost, I loved gun hunting and climbing. totally worth the game
review_feedback: Thank you so much for feedback

review_title: Good intro of What is VR Experience
one_reviews_text:
For the cost of this, I think it is reasonable and looking forward for more updating.
If my family or friends want to experiece what and how is VR, this software is surely one of first choices.
